tag_list: shai, cohen, mobile, applosophy, iphone, ipad, smart-tv, ui, interface
overview:
A highly ethical, driven, enthusiastic and passionate software technology services leader with 15 years experience. Working for some of the world’s most respected innovation and software technology firms. He has very strong client facing skills and a history of building long-term relationships with clients and industry leaders. He has proven abilities in leading, working and communicating with multidisciplinary distributed teams including Designers, Product Managers, Developers, Architects, QA Engineers and Executives. Complementing his leadership acumen is a hands-on passion for technology. He has a very sophisticated architecture and development skill set that has delivered significant value to both start-up and corporate clients across the domains of Rich Enterprise and Consumer Web, Mobile, Desktop, Consumer and Embedded Applications.

Specialties Mobile Development, User interface Innovative Leadership / Mentorship / Team Building Creative Software Architecture Business Development / Start-ups and New Product / Technology Launch IT Support / Strategy / Execution
